name: Overgrown (Seelocanth)
description:
Overgrown is a simple weed management game. Use your arsenal of yard tools to prevent an uncontrollable weed outbreak with strategic deck-building gameplay.

CONTROLS

Left mouse button - Select card / target

Right mouse button - Discard

TIPS

-Once per round, discarding will allow you to draw a new card (indicated by the yellow orb).
